S.5. An area for outdoor educational
activities, e.g., social, physical, athletic,
cultural, military training, etc. exists.
The Bagtas Magkaisa Dome is used as a multipurpose hall for events, training and programs, and other CvSU Tanza Campus Activities.

Pabahay Court and Bagtas Magkaisa Park was being
used for cultural, athletic and educational activities.
